scripts.start:alone:connect: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.development nx run redi-connect:serve
scripts.start:alone:talent-pool: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.development nx run redi-talent-pool:serve
scripts.start:alone:api: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.development nx run api:serve
scripts.start:alone:nestjs-api: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.development nx run nestjs-api:serve
scripts.deploy:storybook: yarn nx run shared-atomic-design-components:build-storybook && aws s3 rm s3://storybook.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/storybook/shared-atomic-design-components/ s3://storybook.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:storybook
scripts.deploy-everything:redi-connect: yarn run deploy-production:redi-connect && yarn run deploy-demonstration:redi-connect
scripts.deploy-production:redi-talent-pool: env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-talent-pool:build && aws s3 rm s3://talent-pool.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-talent-pool/ s3://talent-pool.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-talent-pool:prod
scripts.deploy-production:redi-connect: env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:prod
scripts.deploy-demonstration:redi-connect: env-cmd -f .env.demonstration nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://app.demo.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://app.demo.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:demonstration
scripts.deploy-demonstration:redi-talent-pool: env-cmd -f .env.demonstration nx run redi-talent-pool:build && aws s3 rm s3://app.demo.talent-pool.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-talent-pool/ s3://app.demo.talent-pool.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-talent-pool:demonstration
scripts.invalidate-cache:redi-talent-pool:prod: AWS_PAGER="" aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1QPHOLEEYBWFN --paths '/*' --profile redi-connect-deployment
scripts.invalidate-cache:redi-talent-pool:demons: AWS_PAGER="" aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1WLM72B6FJ082 --paths '/*' --profile redi-connect-deployment
scripts.invalidate-cache:redi-connect:prod: AWS_PAGER="" aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2Y7UDI2DW52TZ --paths '/*' --profile redi-connect-deployment
scripts.invalidate-cache:redi-connect:demonstrat: AWS_PAGER="" aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E33LAGO1KPBTUA --paths '/*' --profile redi-connect-deployment
scripts.build:redi-connect: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-connect:build
scripts.build:redi-talent-pool: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-talent-pool:build
scripts.build:nestjs-api: yarn clean && env-cmd -f .env.production nx run nestjs-api:build --prod
